			<h3>Install R</h3>

			<h3>Install R Tools</h3>
			R Tools can be downloaded and installed from <a target="r" href="https://cran.r-project.org/bin/windows/Rtools/rtools40.html">https://cran.r-project.org/bin/windows/Rtools/rtools40.html</a>
			<img width="800px" src="./img/developer-how-tos/r-install/download-rtools.png" />

			<h3>Install RStudio</h3>
			R can be downloaded and installed from <a target="r" href="https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/">https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/</a>
			<br/>
			<p style="color: red;">
				The first time you launch R you will be prompted if you want to install devtools.  Select Yes.
